message: Let's start fair.  I take the lion's share, but you get something to keep you interested.
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's not drag this out. Time is money!
I'm still willing to split it fairly, but I need more than that to make it worth my while.  Let's find a compromise.
This is getting us nowhere Alice.  I'm meeting you closer to the middle, but this needs to end soon!
